However, it has been observed that some mischievous and unscrupulous persons in the of fake and fictitious identity have been defaming and maligning the  reputation of officers and NHAI as well by publishing the defamatory articles on the NHAI Facebook, which has been viewed seriously. 3 It has, therefore, been decided that any article published by any User on the NHAI Facebook, which contains abusive/intemperatel defamatory/ derogatory/ objectionable languagelpersonalized remarks or comments Or opinions against any individual officer Or NHAI shall be SUO moto removed/deleted by the Administrator of NHAI Facebook immediately _ 4_ In case any officer still has objections against any content posted on NHAI Facebook, he may approach the Facebook Helpdesk at Phone No; 011- 25074100 Extn 1707 or send an e-mail at rgrms@nhaiorg Or contact Shri P.K.
